name: Painkiller Heaven's Got A Hitman
description:
HEAVEN'S GOT A HITMAN


I died as Daniel Garner.
I was sentenced to serve in pain somewhere between Heaven and Hell.
I lost my faith, but gained a new name.
Now, I'm the angels' only prayer.

GRIPPING SINGLE-PLAYER ACTION Crank up the intensity as you blast your way through 24 levels of mayhem and more than 50 species of Hell's wildest incarnations.

BRING THE FUN BACK TO MULTIPLAYER! Battle online with Painkiller's 5 hardcore multi-player modes, including Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch and the unique People Can Fly mode.

Insane Physics, using the world's most advanced physics engine - Havok 2.0

Challenge massive bosses in the 4 single-player difficulty levels.

Hoards of incredibly detailed monsters with individual and cooperative attacks.

Insane power-ups morph into a demon and kill on sight!
